description: [Moneybird](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1137) targets a common set of file types such as documents, certificates, and database files for encryption while avoiding executable, dynamic linked libraries, and similar items.(Citation: CheckPoint Agrius 2023)

external_references.description: Marc  Salinas Fernandez & Jiri  Vinopal. (2023, May 23). AGRIUS DEPLOYS MONEYBIRD IN TARGETED ATTACKS AGAINST ISRAELI ORGANIZATIONS. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
